sections.heading: Issues; kinds.Issues arise on the pleadings where a fact or conclusion of law is maintained by one party and controverted by the other
sections.text: They are of two kinds: (1) Of law; (2) of fact.SourceR.S.1867, Code § 277, p. 440;R.S.1913, § 7840;C.S.1922, § 8784;C.S.1929, § 20-1101;R.S.1943, § 25-1101.Annotati
